jcr:content.jcr:title: List of craters on the Moon

contentheadline.headline: List of craters on the Moon

contentrichtext.text: [[File:Moon's impact crater Tycho.jpg|thumb|Crater Tycho taken by the [[Hubble Space Telescope]].<ref>{{cite news|title=Using the Moon as a mirror — Hubble to watch transit of Venus in reflected light|url=http://www.spacetelescope.org/images/potw1219a/|accessdate=8 May 2012|newspaper=ESA/Hubble Picture of the Week}}</ref> ]] This is a '''list of [[Lunar craters|craters on the Moon]]'''. The large majority of these features are [[impact crater]]s. The [[Planetary nomenclature|crater nomenclature]] is governed by the [[International Astronomical Union]], and this listing only includes features that are officially recognized by that scientific society. == Craters == The lunar craters are listed in the following subsections. Where a formation has associated [[wikt:satellite|satellite]] craters, these are detailed on the main crater description pages. {{Moon craters content}} == See also == {{portal|Moon}} * [[List of people with craters of the Moon named after them]] * [[List of maria on the Moon]] * [[List of mountains on the Moon]] * [[List of valleys on the Moon]] * [[Selenography]] * [[List of lunar features]] == References == {{Reflist}} The following sources were used as references on the individual crater pages. <!-- {{Lunar crater references}} --> * {{cite book | author=Andersson, L. E.; [[Ewen Whitaker|Whitaker, E. A.]], | year=1982 | title=NASA Catalogue of Lunar Nomenclature | publisher=NASA RP-1097 }} * {{cite web | last=Blue | first=Jennifer | date=July 25, 2007 | url=http://planetarynames.wr.usgs.gov/ | title=Gazetteer of Planetary Nomenclature | publisher=USGS | accessdate=2007-08-05 }} * {{cite book | author=[[Ben Bussey|Bussey, B.]]; [[Paul Spudis|Spudis, P.]], | year=2004 | title=The Clementine Atlas of the Moon | publisher=Cambridge University Press | location=New York | isbn=0-521-81528-2 }} * {{cite book | author=Cocks, Elijah E.; Cocks, Josiah C. | year=1995 | title=Who's Who on the Moon: A Biographical Dictionary of Lunar Nomenclature | publisher=Tudor Publishers | isbn=0-936389-27-3 }} * {{cite web | last=McDowell | first=Jonathan | date=July 15, 2007 | url=http://host.planet4589.org/astro/lunar/ | title=Lunar Nomenclature | publisher=Jonathan's Space Report | accessdate=2007-10-24 }} * {{cite web | last=Menzel | first=Donald H. | date=February 1971 | url=http://ntrs.nasa.gov/archive/nasa/casi.ntrs.nasa.gov/19710009151_1971009151.pdf | title=Final Report on NGR 22-007-194, Lunar Nomenclature | format=PDF | publisher=NASA | accessdate=2008-08-07 }} * {{cite journal | author = Menzel, D. H.; Minnaert, M.; Levin, B.; Dollfus, A.; Bell, B. | title=Report on Lunar Nomenclature by The Working Group of Commission 17 of the IAU | journal=Space Science Reviews | year=1971 | volume=12 | issue = 2 | pages=136 | bibcode=1971SSRv...12..136M | doi = 10.1007/BF00171763}} * {{cite book | first=Patrick | last=Moore | authorlink=Patrick Moore | year=2001 | title=On the Moon | publisher=Sterling Publishing Co. | isbn=0-304-35469-4 }} * {{cite book | first=Fred W. | last=Price | year=1988 | title=The Moon observer's handbook | publisher=Cambridge University Press | isbn=0-521-33500-0 }} * {{cite book | first=Antonín | last=Rükl | authorlink=Antonín Rükl | year=1990 | title=Atlas of the Moon | publisher=Kalmbach Books | isbn=0-913135-17-8 }} * {{cite book | first=Rev. T. W. | last=Webb | authorlink=Thomas William Webb | year=1962 | title=Celestial Objects for Common Telescopes | edition=6th revision | publisher=Dover | isbn=0-486-20917-2 }} * {{cite book | first=Ewen A. | last=Whitaker | authorlink=Ewen Whitaker | year=1999 | title=Mapping and Naming the Moon | publisher=Cambridge University Press | isbn=0-521-62248-4 }} * {{cite book | first=Peter T. | last=Wlasuk | year=2000 | title=Observing the Moon | publisher=Springer | isbn=1-85233-193-3 }} == External links == The following reference sites were also used during the assembly of the crater information. * [http://www.rccr.cremona.it/monografie/luna/ Astronomica Langrenus] — Italian Lunar Web Site * [http://planetarynames.wr.usgs.gov/ Gazetteer of Planetary Nomenclature] * [http://www.lpi.usra.edu/resources/lunar_atlases/ Lunar Atlases] at the Lunar & Planetary Institute ** [http://www.lpi.usra.edu/research/lunar_orbiter/ Digital Lunar Orbiter Photographic Atlas of the Moon] * [http://www.planet4589.org/astro/lunar Lunar Nomenclature] * [http://LPOD.wikispaces.com Lunar Photo of the Day] by Charles A. Wood ''et al.'' {{The Moon}} [[Category:Impact craters on the Moon|*]] [[Category:Surface features of bodies of the Solar System|Moon]] [[Category:Lists of impact craters|Moon]] [[Category:Lists of impact craters on the Moon|*]]
